name: Two Suns Over Tuscon
description:
Have you ever wanted to drive a large recreational vehicle through the vast deserts of Arizona and do sick tricks and flips? Well know you can in Two Suns Over Tuscon, the ground breaking new RV stunt game.

Developed as part of the 2019 Global Game Jam and winner of the prestigious "Home is Where the Gas Tank is Award".

A game by Corran Nolan, Damon Stallman, and Lucas Valensa.
